subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Interscholastic Athletics
Reality Television
Basketball
Television
lead_paragraph: Overaggressive parents hollering from the stands have become a cliché, but some Kentucky moms have turned parental cheering into an art form — and, they hope, a business.
snippet: Overaggressive parents hollering from the stands have become a cliché, but some Kentucky moms have turned parental cheering into an art form — and, they hope, a business.
